name: title
description: The title of the YouTube video

name: description
description: The description of the YouTube Video

name: publishedAt
description: The date when the video was published

name: channelId
description: The id of the YouTube channel where the video is uploaded

name: categoryId
description: The YouTube video category associated with the video.

name: tags
description: The YouTube video tags associated with the video.

name: defaultLanguage
description: The language of the text in the video resource title and description properties.

name: definition
description: Indicates whether the video is available in high definition (HD) or only in standard definition.

name: licensedContent
description: Indicates whether the video represents licensed content, which means that the content was uploaded to a channel linked to a YouTube content partner and then claimed by that partner.

name: ytContentRating
description: A rating that YouTube uses to identify age-restricted content.

name: viewCount
description: The number of times the video has been viewed.

name: likeCount
description: The number of users who have indicated that they liked the video.

name: commentCount
description: The number of comments for the video.

name: datetime_updated
description: The datetime the data was pulled from YouTube
